name: Coconect
overview:
Coconect is an online business service that makes it quick & easy for businesses to send great personalized wishes to their customers.

Schedule, send birthday & keep-in-touch messages automatically the whole year through. Choose either e-card or sms as your sending option. (More options to come).

Perfect to slot in between your sales, marketing email, sms or your next meet with them.

Integrate your contacts with Coconect. We currently integrate with Google, Yahoo contacts, CRM like Zoho and email marketing provider like Mailchimp. Say good-bye to scheduling reminders and creating tasks for each contact one by one to send birthday greetings and keep in touch messages, hooray!

Saves your time & effort because:

  1. After you selected the events and linked your address book, your contacts are detected and greetings/messages will be automatically scheduled!
  2. No need to create emails or design.
  3. No brain-freeze thinking of what to write- Use our suggested messages to inspire you.

It’s low maintenance, less effort, 100% friendly.

So, go ahead and put the :) back in business!

Grab your free account and start to send 30 e-cards free.

Oh yes, join us on Facebook too. Looking forward to see ya!
